Bristol Computational Neuroscience Unit

BCNU is one of the leading computational neuroscience research units in the United Kingdom.
We aim to further our understanding of brain functioning via computational and mathematical modelling.

â€‹We are based at the Faculty of Engineering and have strong links with the wider Bristol Neuroscience and Machine Learning communities at the University of Bristol.

Location

We are based in the beautiful Clifton campus as part of the School of Computer Science, Electrical and Electronic Engineering, and Engineering Maths (SCEEM), Faculty of Engineering, University of Bristol.
